Scripts.OnLoad: function self:SetText(str) self.text:SetText(str) local x, y = self.text:GetSize() self:SetSize(x, y+2) self:Show() end function self:Attach() self:ClearAllPoints() if GuideLines_HorizRuler.point == -1 then self:SetPoint("TOP", GuideLines_HorizRuler, "BOTTOM", 0, -1) else self:SetPoint("BOTTOM", GuideLines_HorizRuler, "TOP", 0, 1) end if GuideLines_VertRuler.point == -1 then self:SetPoint("LEFT", GuideLines_VertRuler, "RIGHT", 1, 0) else self:SetPoint("RIGHT", GuideLines_VertRuler, "LEFT", -1, 0) end end self:SetFrameLevel(100)

SLASH_GUIDELINES1, SLASH_GUIDELINES2 = "/guidelines", "/guides" function SlashCmdList.GUIDELINES() if self:IsShown() then self:Hide() else self:Show() end end self.rulersize = 20 self.guidesize = 5 self.ruleralpha = 0.9 self:SetFrameLevel(100) self:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED")
Scripts.OnUpdate:
local wX, wY = UIParent:GetSize() wX, wY = wX/2, wY/2
local cX, cY = GetCursorPosition() cX, cY = cX/UIParent:GetScale(), cY/UIParent:GetScale()
if GuideLines.dragging then if floor(GuideLines.dragging:GetWidth() + 0.5) == GuideLines.guidesize then cX = GuideLines.dragging:GetLeft() + (GuideLines.guidesize/2) else cY = GuideLines.dragging:GetBottom() + (GuideLines.guidesize/2) end end
local X, Y = floor((cX-wX) * 10 + 0.5) / 10, floor((cY-wY) * 10 + 0.5) / 10
GuideLinesTT:SetText("(" .. X .. ", " .. Y .. ")")
Scripts.OnEvent:
if event == "ADDON_LOADED" and ... == "GuideLines" then if GuideLinesDB then for i, db in pairs(GuideLinesDB.guides) do GuideLines.LoadingDB = 1 print(db.parent, _G[db.parent], db.template) local guide = CreateFrame("Button", nil, _G[db.parent], db.template) guide:ClearAllPoints() guide:SetPoint(db.point[1], UIParent, db.point[3], db.point[4], db.point[5]) guide.db = db end
if GuideLinesDB.HorizRulerPoint ~= GuideLines_HorizRuler.point then GuideLines_HorizRuler:Click("RightButton") end if GuideLinesDB.VertRulerPoint ~= GuideLines_VertRuler.point then GuideLines_VertRuler:Click("RightButton") end
GuideLines.LoadingDB = nil else GuideLinesDB = { guides = {}, HorizRulerPoint = -1, VertRulerPoint = -1, } end self:UnregisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED") end

Scripts.OnEnter: if not GuideLines.dragging or GuideLines.dragging == self then self.tex:SetTexture(.25,.92,1,1) end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not self.lockhighlight then self.tex:SetTexture(0,0,0,1) end

Scripts.OnDragStop:
local X, Y = GetCursorPosition() if (self:GetParent().point == -1 and X < GuideLines.rulersize + GuideLines.guidesize/2) or (self:GetParent().point == 1 and GetScreenWidth()*UIParent:GetScale() - X < GuideLines.rulersize + GuideLines.guidesize/2) then tDeleteItem(GuideLinesDB.guides, self.db) end self.db.point = {self:GetPoint()} self.db.point[2] = nil
self:StopMovingOrSizing() self.lockhighlight = nil GuideLines.dragging = nil
Scripts.OnUpdate: if IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") and not GuideLines.LoadingDB then self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", UIParent, "TOPLEFT", GetCursorPosition()/UIParent:GetScale()-GuideLines.guidesize/2, 0) else self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) self:GetScript("OnDragStop")(self) if GetMouseFocus() == self then self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self) else self:GetScript("OnLeave")(self) end end
Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton")
self:SetSize(GuideLines.guidesize, GetScreenHeight()) self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", UIParent)
local inset = min(0, GuideLines.guidesize-5) self:SetHitRectInsets(inset, inset, 0, 0) self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel() - 1)
self.lockhighlight = 1 self.isOver = 1 GuideLines.dragging = self
if not GuideLines.LoadingDB then self.db = { template = "GuideLines_VertGuideTemplate", parent = self:GetParent():GetName(), point = {self:GetPoint()} } tinsert(GuideLinesDB.guides, self.db) end

Scripts.OnDragStop:
local X, Y = GetCursorPosition() if (self:GetParent().point == -1 and GetScreenHeight()*UIParent:GetScale() - Y < GuideLines.rulersize + GuideLines.guidesize/2) or (self:GetParent().point == 1 and Y < GuideLines.rulersize + GuideLines.guidesize/2) then tDeleteItem(GuideLinesDB.guides, self.db) end self.db.point = {self:GetPoint()} self.db.point[2] = nil
self:StopMovingOrSizing() self.lockhighlight = nil GuideLines.dragging = nil
Scripts.OnUpdate: if IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") and not GuideLines.LoadingDB then self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", UIParent, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, select(2, GetCursorPosition())/UIParent:GetScale()-GuideLines.guidesize/2) else self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) self:GetScript("OnDragStop")(self) if GetMouseFocus() == self then self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self) else self:GetScript("OnLeave")(self) end end
Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton")
self:SetSize(GetScreenWidth(), GuideLines.guidesize) self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", UIParent)
local inset = min(0, GuideLines.guidesize-5) self:SetHitRectInsets(0, 0, inset, inset) self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel() - 1)
self.lockhighlight = 1 self.isOver = 1 GuideLines.dragging = self
if not GuideLines.LoadingDB then self.db = { template = "GuideLines_HorizGuideTemplate", parent = self:GetParent():GetName(), point = {self:GetPoint()} } tinsert(GuideLinesDB.guides, self.db) end

Scripts.OnEnter:
if IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") or IsMouseButtonDown("RightButton") then return end local title = [[GuideLines]] local text = [[Left-click and drag from a ruler onto the screen to create a new guide.
Drag guides onto a ruler to delete them.
Right-click on a ruler to move it to the other side of the screen if it is in the way.
Type "/guidelines" to hide all rulers and guides.]]
GameTooltip_SetDefaultAnchor(GameTooltip, self) GameTooltip:AddLine(title, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(text, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForClicks("RightButtonUp") self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") self.point = -1 self.tick:ClearAllPoints() self.tick:SetSize(2, GuideLines.rulersize) self:SetHeight(GuideLines.rulersize) self:SetAlpha(GuideLines.ruleralpha)
self.ticks = {} for i = 0, self:GetWidth()/2 + 50, 50 do local t = self:CreateTexture(nil, "OVERLAY") t:SetSize(1, self:GetHeight()) t:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "CENTER", i, 0) t:SetTexture(0, 0, 0, 1) local f = self:CreateFontString(nil, "OVERLAY", "GameFontNormalSmall") f:SetPoint("LEFT", self, "CENTER", i, 0) f:SetText(i)
local t = self:CreateTexture(nil, "OVERLAY") t:SetSize(1, self:GetHeight()) t:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "CENTER", -i, 0) t:SetTexture(0, 0, 0, 1) if i ~= 0 then local f = self:CreateFontString(nil, "OVERLAY", "GameFontNormalSmall") f:SetPoint("LEFT", self, "CENTER", -i, 0) f:SetText(i) end end
Scripts.OnClick: if button == "RightButton" then self:ClearAllPoints() if self.point == 1 then self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT") self:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT") else self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT") self:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT") end self.point = -self.point GuideLinesDB.HorizRulerPoint = self.point GuideLinesTT:Attach() end

self:RegisterForClicks("RightButtonUp") self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") self.point = -1 self.tick:ClearAllPoints() self.tick:SetSize(GuideLines.rulersize, 2) self:SetWidth(GuideLines.rulersize) self:SetAlpha(GuideLines.ruleralpha)
self.ticks = {} for i = 0, self:GetHeight()/2 + 50, 50 do local t = self:CreateTexture(nil, "OVERLAY") t:SetSize(self:GetWidth(), 1) t:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "CENTER", 0, i) t:SetTexture(0, 0, 0, 1) local f = self:CreateFontString(nil, "OVERLAY", "GameFontNormalSmall") f:SetPoint("TOP", self, "CENTER", 0, i) f:SetText(i)
local t = self:CreateTexture(nil, "OVERLAY") t:SetSize(self:GetWidth(), 1) t:SetPoint("CENTER", self, "CENTER", 0, -i) t:SetTexture(0, 0, 0, 1) if i ~= 0 then local f = self:CreateFontString(nil, "OVERLAY", "GameFontNormalSmall") f:SetPoint("TOP", self, "CENTER", 0, -i) f:SetText(i) end end
Scripts.OnClick: if button == "RightButton" then self:ClearAllPoints() if self.point == 1 then self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT") self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT") else self:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT") self:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT") end self.point = -self.point GuideLinesDB.VertRulerPoint = self.point GuideLinesTT:Attach() end
